snippet: Russell Westbrook scored 27 points, Kevin Durant added 26 points and 10 rebounds and the Oklahoma City Thunder used a dominating third quarter to beat visiting Chicago.
abstract: Oklahoma City Thunder defeat Chicago Bulls, 92-78, to clinch playoff berth; other NBA results noted.
lead_paragraph: Russell Westbrook scored 27 points, Kevin Durant added 26 points and 10 rebounds and the Oklahoma City Thunder used a dominating third quarter to beat visiting Chicago.
